forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain overnight. Low 5C.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain overnight. Lows overnight in the low 40s.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Clearing late. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clearing skies after some evening light rain. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 36F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High near 10C. Winds NNE at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 2C. ENE winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 10C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 51F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 48F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
